text: Notwithstanding the definition of Height in CLAUSE V - INTERPRETATION, SECTION (f), Definitions, the height of any building shown on Schedule '2' of By-law 268-2018, as measured from Canadian Geodetic Datum elevation of 176.6 metres to the highest point of the building or structure, shall not exceed the height in metres specified by the numbers following the symbol HT of By-law 268-2018.
